inn1.comm: good start, getting it to pitch outside off stump and swing away, and its left alone
slower delivery on middle and leg, tapped into the gap at midwicket for a quick single and thats the first run
a touch fuller outside off stump, van Wyk likes 'em there, driving to Yuvraj at point
good length pitching outside leg stump, comes in and he defends it on the hop
good length, moving away, he defends it to point
much fuller, beating his lusty drive with zero footwork
and he's welcomed back with a thumping cover drive, de Villiers getting out to the half-volley and finding the gap
full still, but outside off stump and seaming away off the seam, de Villiers leaves well alone this time
touch wider outside off stump, asking him to come drive, and thats low carry to Dhoni behind the stumps
good length on off stump, good carry, de Villiers comes forward and defends, turning it to square leg for a quick single
that's out! Agarkar pitches it fullish just outside off stump, gets it to swing in and catches van Wyk inching forward plumb in front and umpire Benson raises the finger in a flash
good ball, pitching on a good length and moving away from him as he tentatively gets forward and holds back the bat
good length, angling away and he shoulders arms to it
good length on middle and off, he gets behind and defends it to leg
a touch fuller, again angled across the stumps and he leaves it be
fullish outside off stump, he gets forward and loses a hand on the drive, the ball rolling to Chawla at mid-off and an early call from de Villiers gets him down the other end
beaten! This one pitches on a sweet length and lifts well past Kallis, who's completely squared up off the back foot, very impressive length
good length on the stumps, he gets back and rolls the wrists to leg
good length outside off stump, hit hard into the covers where Karthik dives and gets a hand on it to slow it down
fullish outside off stump, he gets an eye in and leaves it be
good length just outside off stump, he gets forward and defends to cover
what a delivery! A peach! Pitches on a great length on off stump, then straightens and swings the other way and Kallis, playing forward, is completely flummoxed and his off stump goes for a walk
good stuff again, beating Gibbs' forward defensive
fuller and wider outside off stump, and Gibbs wants nothing to do with that ball

whoah! Zaheer pitches it back of a length, on off stump, gets it to move away and just clip the bottom egde of the bat, and Tendulkar at first slip holds a neat catch, but umpire Dar doesnt react! What was wrong with that? Replays show a clear edge...oh ho ho!
dropped! Full on leg stump and he clips it low to a diving Gambhir at square leg, who gets it, then juggles it out of his hands...wow!
bang, thats four! de Villiers rocks back and pulls a short delivery through midwicket
beaten! Now he comes down the track and tries to cream a short delivery over the covers but cant connect
good length, drawing him forward and beating him as he defends forward
good length, pitching in and straightening very close to off stump as he leaves it be
good length on the stumps, played to square leg
a touch fuller outside off stump, pushed to point off the front foot
good length outside off stump and he leans forward, opening the face of the bat and getting off the mark with one down to third man
slower delivery, on a length outside off stump, de Villiers thinks about playing it but resists at the end
full this time, he gets forward and drives to mid-on
full outside off stump, pitching and swinging away, he gets forward and shoulders arms
back of a length outside off stump, Gibbs chases it a with no footwork and gets beaten
back of a length, hitting the seam on middle and off and moving in sharply and he's beaten on the hop, what movement!
back of a length on off stump, Gibbs gets up and defends it back to Zaheer
fuller and wider this time, he gets forward and drives away from the body and the thick outside edge flies wide of Ganguly at second slip, beating Agarkar down at third man as well
back of a length on off stump, he gets across and defends it to leg
full outside off stump, he doesnt get to the pitch but stands and drives that back past Zaheer's outstretched left hand and the stumps for one, good fielding by mid-off and mid-on
good length on leg stump, turned straight to Gambhir at square leg
good length outside off stump, he gets onto the front foot and drives into mid-off for one
fullish, moving away sharply and he leaves it alone with a stride forward
good length outside off stump, just a touch slower and getting good carry to the 'keeper, de Villiers again has to hold back on the shot at the nth second
a touch fuller this time, bringing him forward in defense and the ball rolls straight to cover
good length in that excellent channel again, de Villiers unsure of whether to come forward or go back and ends up leaving
great delivery, pitching back of a length on middle and leg and moving on over the stumps, Gibbs totally squared up
drifts down leg stump and he turns it down to fine leg
slower delivery, back of a length outside off stump, he goes for the cut and then holds back on the shot, the ball flying through the vacant point region and down to third man
good length on leg stump, turned fine for a single
good length on off stump, moving off the seam, he gets forward with an edge along the ground to third man
much fuller, angled across the stumps and he shoulders arms
short of a length on off stump, he swivels into his pull but misses, and the ball stayed low as it passed the stumps
fuller delivery across the stumps, he drives and gets an inside-edge to midwicket
good length just outside off stump, defended to point
overpitched outside off stump, he leans forward and drives to mid-off
back of a length outside leg stump, he gets up and tries to work it to leg, but the ball drops near the stumps
pitches full and straightens, he gets forward and turns it to midwicket
good start, straightforward delivery on off stump, he tries to work it to leg but cant
beaten, the slow delivery pitching on a length and going past his off stump as he prods forward
this one's overpitched and driven into the mid-off region, where some good fielding keeps them down to just the single, Ganguly applauds that effort
good line and length again, drawing Gibbs forward and thats defended to cover
pitches outside leg and moves on down, he gets a good stride forward and tries to turn it fine but the ball brushes his pads
a touch fuller and he gets forward, defending to point
overpitched outside off stump, he gets down on bended knee and drives, but mistimes the shot into the ground and the ball goes to leg
slower delivery, still full but this time he gets forward and defends firmly to point
good length on off stump, he gets forward and defends it back, though he was eyeing the flick to leg
overpitched outside off stump, he gets forward and drives well into the covers where some good work from Dravid cuts it down to just one
short of a length outside off stump, he gets back and cuts hard with a thick edge over the vacant short third man region
fuller outside off stump, he gets bat and pad together and drives to mid-off
oh ho! Gibbs stands and pushes forward to a good length delivery that gets up and sneaks through the gap and nearly takes off stump! That was close

goddim! The ball pitches on middle stump, straightens, de Villiers gets forward and tries to defend with an angled bat, the ball clips the edge before hitting the pad and then bobs up ever so gently for Dhoni to move forward and take it

and a second! Duminy goes first ball! This one was marginally quicker, by Ganguly's standard anyways, pitching on leg stump and forcing him back, he misses out on an attempted flick to leg and gets struck in line with leg stump! Aleem Dar gets the finger up quickly after bowler and 'keeper belt out an appeal! Ganguly!
good ball, pitching full and moving in and Kemp gets away with an inside-edge to short fine leg
full and wide, pitching and moving away, with good carry to Dhoni, as its left alone
short of a length outside off stump, and Gibbs pulls through midwicket out to the sweeper, for two
close! Full delivery, pitching just outside off stump and coming in to beat Kemp, who thinks it'll go the other way, shouldering arms
too full this time, outside off stump, straightens again but this time he can leave that be with little hassle
good length, missing leg stump as he gets forward and defends and misses, the ball rolls to short fine leg
good length, angled across off stump, Kemp gets forward and has to hold back on the shot
fuller this time, he gets forward and defends firmly to cover
good length, he gets a big stride forward and defends back to RP
pitches outside leg stump and its turned into the gap for one
good length outside off stump, he stands and plays at it and another inside-edge narrowly misses leg stump
back of a length outside off stump, he cuts and the ball flies safely in the air wide of first slip, shouts of catch it there
much fuller delivery this time, and Gibbs gets forward to drive towards mid-off for one
beaten! This one pitches back of a length and seams away with good carry and Kemp, initially looking to get forward, is forced to go back
full on middle and leg, he gets forward and turns it to midwicket, calling for the single as Ganguly got in Gibbs' way
good length outside off stump, driven at and beaten
good delivery! Pitches full in line with the stumps and catches him coming forward, a very confident shout but umpire Benson shakes the head...hmm, height perhaps?
yorker this time, and another inside-edge for Kemp to square leg
full outside off stump, driven into the mid-off region
short of a length outside leg stump, he gets up and turns it off the hips for one
full outside off stump, he gets well forward and defends softly, picking up one to point, well run
good length outside off stump, left alone with a raise of the bat
good length just outside off stump, he gets across and defends
too short outside off stump and Kemp cracks that off the back foot out to cover sweeper
fuller delivery outside off stump, he comes forward and defends to point
good length outside off stump, hurrying him into his defense and the ball rolls wide of point
back of a length down leg stump, he shuffles across and turns it into the gap behind square, Tendulkar does the fielding from fine leg
good length on leg stump, turned out to backward square leg
overpitched outside off stump and he drives that brilliantly through the covers but Ganguly does the fielding out on the ropes
full again, but just outside off stump and Kemp defends
full on middle and leg, swings in and clips the pads, ball lobs up and falls safely before midwicket, a stifled appeal from the bowler
full on leg stump, he shuffles and clips this out to deep backward square leg
good length, drawing him well forward, and for what seems like the umpteenth time Kemp gets an inside-edge safely to leg
back of a length outside off stump, he drives off the back foot to cover, where Karthik dives to his left but cant hold back the double that raises the 50
fuller length, he gets forward and defends it back towards mid-off
pitches on middle and leg and its turned straight to midwicket
good length this time, sitting up suddenly and surprising him, he has to hold back on the shot and the ball flies to cover
good length again, he comes forward and defends

much fuller, coming in and beating him on the front-foot drive, the ball goes between bat and pad and clips him, Ganguly appeals but the umpire isnt interested, that ball moving too much and they scamper a leg bye
good length outside off stump, hit hard into the covers and they steal one
dropped! Kemp comes down and flashes a wide half-volley to Karthik at cover, who dives up in the air, gets hands to it, but lets it out as he hits the ground! That ball was travelling!
fuller on middle and off, he comes out the track and gets beaten by the swing, the ball narrowly missing off stump
good shot! Kemp takes the overpitched delivery outside off stump and drives to the right of mid-off, who had no chance stopping that one
full again, Kemp comes onto the front foot and drives into the covers, where Karthik dives and saves three runs
good length outside off stump, he walks into the shot and steers it to point
pitches on middle and leg and moves down sharply, Kemp gets forward and defends, Ganguly and Dhoni appeal but umpire Dar shakes his head...not a bad shot but looked to be doing too much
good length on off stump, driven back to Ganguly
too short down leg stump and Kemp swivels on the pull and picks the gap behind square
awesome shot! Ganguly pitches short outside off stump this time and Kemp pulls it over midwicket for four more
straighter delivery, no room to cut or pull, and Kemp defends back to Ganguly
full outside off stump, a premiditated Kemp gets across and onto one knee, sweeping to square leg
tossed up, Kemp gets onto the front foot and isnt to the pitch, ends up driving very close to mid-off but beating the man
well flighted up, slow in the air, Gibbs too is deceived in the flight and drives to cover
the wrong 'un goes too wide, Gibbs rocks back and slaps that in the gap behind point for four, top shot
tossed up well outside off stump, Gibbs leaves it be
tossed up, now he uses his feet, backing to leg and square-driving in the gap at point out to the fielder
gives it some air on middle and leg, Kemp comes down but gets beaten in the flight, driving across the line and getting a leading-edge along the ground to point
tossed up on leg stump, pulled out to deep backward square leg
tossed up on off stump, played back to the bowler
comes out, he sees it and changes the length, and Kemp drives streakily to cover
flatter on the stumps, he gets back and pulls into the ground in front of square leg
tossed up, he drives back to Yuvraj
short and wide, its starts to gain on him and he tries to pull out of the cut shot, but the ball rolls to point
thats maximum! Tossed up, he sees the room on offer and charges down, picking it nicely over extra cover for six
flatter on leg stump, he nudges it around the corner and raises the 50-run stand
flighted up outside off stump, he gets down and drives across the line towards mid-on
too much room and he cuts hard out to deep cover
tossed up on middle and leg, he gets down again and drives against the spin, getting one to short fine leg
width again outside off stump, he waits for it and runs it very late down to third man, where Zaheer has fielding to do
steps out casually and carves a short-pitched delivery over mid-on
a bit flatter, he rocks back and pulls into midwicket
flat down leg stump, he tries the sweep but mistimes it to short fine leg
just a touch short on middle and leg, and Gibbs pulls out to deep midwicket
thats a shot! Kemp gets down and heaves a flat one across the line, flat as can be, over midwicket for four
bye bye Yuvraj! Thats outta here! Kemp takes him one, again swiping a flat delivery, but this time hard and handsome over wide long-on for half a dozen
flat on middle and leg, driven hard to mid-on
he comes out, Chawla sees him and fires it in full and flat, and he works it to midwicket for one

backs away well outside leg stump, isnt to the pitch but ends up steering this to point, charges down the track, Yuvraj collects and fires in a superb throw back to Chawla, who fails to collect it cleanly, his hand disturbing the stumps
flat on the stumps, he dances down and drives out to long-on
again he backs well outside leg stump, drives and gets beaten by the sharp turn, Dhoni appeals for the stumping but Gibbs is safe
now he dances down the track, doesnt read the flight well but carries through with his shot and clears long-off for six
back of a length outside off stump, he makes room and drives into the covers for one
short outside off stump, he stands his ground and pulls into midwicket but straight to Chawla
moves around the wicket, pitches short, Gibbs backs away and has to reach out, slapping into the covers for one
back over the stumps, Kemp clobbers a full delivery down to long-on, where Karthik does very well to stop it on the bounce
short on the stumps, Gibbs lines it up superbly and flat-bats this back over Zaheer's head, into the gap, and thats four!
better delivery, slower and right in the blockhole and forcing Gibbs, trying to make room, to play it back to him
good delivery, slow outside off stump, beating Kemp as he charges down the track and drives hard
back of a length outside off stump and he's lucky to get away with that, Kemp slamming that into the ground towards mid-off
into the blockhole on off stump, Gibbs backs away and drives to cover
short and wide, slower too, Kemp doesnt read it well and ends up reaching out to mistime a slap, some excellent running gets him two though
full and wide, he reaches out and drives, getting a thick outside edge down to third man and thats his 50, great innings
overpitched on off stump, he straight drives but Agarkar does the fielding
full outside off stump, he clears the front leg and drives away from the body, failing to connect
yorked! Zaheer pitches full into the blockhole, Gibbs stands outside leg and drives, and loses his off stump
back of a length outside off stump, he gets up and steers it to point, where Yuvraj is quick
full outside leg stump, fine leg's up and thats four!
slower ball, well directed on a good length, Boucher tries to shuffle and work it away but has to stand his ground and defend
good length outside off stump, he opens the arms and runs that down past gully and Agarkar moves around from third man to field
slower one, good length just outside off stump, he initially looks to drive but adjusts to run that through gully for one
dances down the track, the ball is short, but he hits it into the gap at mid-on and gets one
looks for the yorker, ends up full, he drives straight back onto the nonstrikers stumps and gets one courtesy the ricochet
slower delivery, short of a length, he shapes to drive through point but makes a mess of it, ending up lobbing this over Agarkar and down to long-on
full outside off stump, driven out to deep cover for one
slower one again, on a length just outside off stump, he steps out and heaves across the line only to get beaten
and he bowls a full toss, which Kemp simply murders over deep midwicket!
bowled! Tendulkar sends one seam-up, it pitches outside leg stump and moves across the stumps, where Kemp has an almighty heave and misses!
much fuller on middle and off, he swings it through midwicket for one
full on the stumps, Boucher makes room and biffs it back over Tendulkar's head, and a brilliant diving stop from Gambhir at long-off saves two
floated up on off stump, he clears the leg and hammers this over mid-off down to Gambhir at long-off
seam-up on middle and leg, Hall clips this off the pads and straight into the safe hands of Karthik at deep mid-on

inn2.comm: starts off with a wide well outside off stump, falling over after he delivers it
good length outside off stump, Ganguly stands his ground and defends to backward point
back of a length this time, he gets up and steers it off the face and de Villiers dives across from point to field
oh well stopped! A touch wider this time, Ganguly cuts hard but de Villiers dives to his left and stops it, one-handed, and saves three
good length outside off stump, tight stuff, Tendulkar warily comes forward and defends
straighter delivery, coming in quickly, Tendulkar rolls the wrists but finds square leg
just drifts onto middle and leg and he turns it superbly in front of square leg, the fast outfield taking care of the rest, top shot
dropped! Tough chance but! Ganguly stands and plays at one angled across him off a short length with an open face, and Kallis dives to his left and doesnt hold on to the offer
edged through the slips! Tendulkar drives away from his body to a fuller one and neither Kallis nor Hall, at first and second, move an inch, just looking at each other! Bizarre!
short of a length outside off stump, he comes forward then holds on the shot as he gets back
back of a length outside off stump, he leaves it be again, low carry to Boucher
back of a length, pitching outside the line and carrying on down the stumps, hits him on the leg but no one appeals

now thats a catch! Tendulkar feels for one outside off stump, that pitches and straightens and climbs, and the edge is brilliantly held by Boucher, inititally moving one way but adjusting to stretch full to his right and pluck it in front of slip, one-handed! Awesome catch!
short delivery, he pulls into the ground just wide of midwicket and gets one
quick, back of a length delivery outside off stump is left alone
this one lifts off a great length and Gambhir has to drop the wrists, allowing it to pass through
back of a length on off stump, played to point with soft hands
marginally fuller this time and he cracks that, on the up, through point for four
fuller and wider, he stands up and drives into the covers for one, was there to be hit but he didnt time his stroke well
full on middle and leg, he flicks into midwicket, the man there and mid-on converge, van Wyk from mid-on dives, midwicket fires in the throw but Gambhir is just in with the dive
short of a length outside leg stump, clips the pad and rolls to short fine leg
fullish outside off stump, played to cover
good leave! Ganguly shuffles up and shoulders arms to one that pitches and straightens to go over off stump, well bowled
slower and fuller on off stump, he mistimes the drive but manages to turn this into the gap at midwicket
back of a length, angled across from off stump and Ganguly shoulders arms
back of a length outside off stump, he lets it go
fuller outside off stump, he drives with an inside-edge to square leg
overpitched in the slot, he drives well but van Wyk times his dive well from mid-off and saves runs, great enthusiasm there
played on! Gambhir tries to latch onto the shortish delivery outside off stump but the ball hurries onto him and he gets an under-edge onto the stumps as he swivels
short of a length outside off stump and thats cracked away through point for four!
and thats a maiden over as one jags back sharply and catches Dravid high on the knee roll
gone! Ganguly flashes outside off stump and gets a thick edge to Boucher
back of a length down leg stump, wide called
back of a length outside off stump, left alone
back of a length again, delivered from around the stumps, and he leaves it be again
good delivery! Nel puts in some extra effort and gets a short delivery to lift and straighten outside off stump, and Yuvraj leaves it be
straighter delivery, on a length, and Yuvraj hurries to defend it back
short outside off stump, he thinks about cutting but leaves it be
good delivery to end the over, another good length delivery outside off stump which he is forced to pull out from
back of a length, cracked off the back foot to cover
slower delivery, full and coming in very sharply off the seam, swings into him and catches him on the front leg, they all go up in appeal but Dar isnt interested...tough call, may have done too much
good length, he gets up and defends
drifts down leg stump, tucked off the hips to square leg
good length delivery just outside off stump, he shuffles across and shoulders arms
slower and fuller outside off stump, he gets forward and leaves it be again
good length outside off stump, gets forward and leaves it alone
fuller this time, swinging and squaring up Dravid, who gets a leading-edge into the gap at gully and down to third man
overpitched outside off stump, doesnt move the feet and pushes into the covers where Duminy gives chase
back of a length outside off stump, he shoulders arms and lets it go
bouncer down leg stump, he ducks down and the umpire signals wide
back of a length, sits up but he gets over it and defends
short of a length outside off stump, he gets a good look at it and shoulders arms
fuller outside leg stump, Dravid nudges it into the gap at midwicket, Kemp chases
good length delivery going across off stump, he gets forward and defends
slower delivery, off a good length, he's tempted to play it but pulls out on the shot
good length on off stump, he gets back and pushes back down the track, Hall gets a hand on it and fields
short of a length outside leg stump, he gets up and turns it into the short fine leg area
back of a length outside off stump, chopped to Gibbs' right, who misfields and allows one
back of a length outside off stump, he hops up and defends to Gibbs
back of a length on leg stump, he doesnt get behind it and ends squared up, the ball rolling to point
good bouncer over off stump, forcing Dravid to get down and arch his back
full down leg stump, wide called
back of a length outside off stump, stays a touch low after Dravid shoulders arms
back of a length outside off stump, again he shoulders arms
full outside off stump, he drives well away from the body and misses
short of a length on leg stump, he's tucked up and defends back
short on the stumps and he short-arm jabs that, more of a clip really, over midwicket's head for a much-needed boundary
full and angled outside off stump, he leaves it be
a bit of room outside off stump allows him to cut hard out to third man
back of a length outside off stump, Dravid's feet go nowhere as he cuts and misses
back of a length outside leg stump, turned down to fine leg for one
bit of room outside off stump but the low bounce doesnt allow it come on, and he chops into the ground
room again and this time he guides it out behind point for two
fuller this time, his feet dont move well but he pushes it into the gap in front of point and picks up one
edged and dropped! Yuvraj stands and pokes at one, straight to Hall and slip, who cant get low enough on the ball as it dips on him
back of a length, and he has to withdraw the bat as the ball passes him
good length on middle and leg, driven to Kemp at mid-on
short of a length, Dravid cuts and mistimes the shot down to third man, where a hopeless bit of fielding from Ntini gives up four
good length on middle and leg, he turns it but straight to the fielder
bangs in the long-hop, which Dravid pulls over square leg and the man on the ropes has fielding to do
fuller, he comes forward and defends towards de Villiers at cover, sets off and Dravid wisely sends him back
back of a length on middle and off, he gets back and turns it fine for one
short of a length, he defends with poor foot movement and luckily for him the edge sneaks through the 'keeper and slip for four
back of a length, he leaves it be for Boucher
back of a length again, and he holds back on the shot
fuller even, Yuvraj's feet dont move as he drives streakily and gets a thick edge well wide of slip, and thats some excellent work on the ropes by big man Nel
full on off stump, he shuffles and tucks it to square leg
slower delivery on off stump, pushed to a diving de Villiers at cover
full outside off stump, defended to point
short of a length down leg stump, tucked around the corner to short fine leg
short and wide, sitting up, he cracks that to backward point
good length, driven to de Villiers at cover
slower one, pushed across him and he pokes at it, beaten
short outside off stump and he cuts into the gap at cover, the ball slows up and Duminy slips and slides to haul it in
back of a length, he gets back and cuts into the covers, crosses for one and Dravid is keen on the second but has to turn and scamper back
again there's too much room on offer and Yuvraj cuts out to deep cover for a couple
good length outside off stump, he gets a good eye in and leaves well alone
not this time though, as he stands and flashes the bat it only to miss out, and the umpire calls wide, harsh call I'd say
angled across him off a length again, and he leaves it alone
short and wide and he brings the wrists down on it, cutting well past point and the sweeper cant cut it off
back of a length on middle and leg, flicked out to deep backward square leg
back of a length outside off stump, defended off the back foot to point
full on leg stump, stays low but he manages to flick into square leg for one
back of a length and he pushes to mid-off
good length outside off stump, pushed to point
good shot! Yuvraj stands his ground and drives a full delivery in the air, on the up with force, wide of mid-off and thats four
overpitched outside off stump, he drives with panache but cant beat mid-off
slower delivery, on a good length, he pokes it to point
full outside off stump, slower ball, he picks it up and heaves over long-on's head
changes the pace and angle, outside off stump, and Dravid pushes to point for one
good length outside off stump, he gets over it and pushes it down to third man
short outside off stump, Dravid gets into position and brings up the 100 with a spanking pull shot through midwicket
even better! Now he comes out and meets a full delivery outside off stump with a flowing straight drive thats beats mid-off
full and wide outside off stump, he uses the feet to push into the covers for one
short of a length, he leans back and cuts down to Hall at third man
full on leg stump, turned to short midwicket
good ball! Lands on a great length and moves past him, beating his backfoot defensive
well bowled again, and Yuvraj does well to dig out the yorker on off stump
good stuff, Ntini changing the pace and angle, the slower delivery just shaves past his tame prod
short of a length outside off stump, and it as moves past him he waits and cuts late in the air, safely down to third man to keep strike
back of a length just outside off stump, played sharply to point
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and cuts towards cover-point, where de Villiers mistimes his slide and allows one

oh thats just poor! Good length delivery, Dravid oddly backs away and chops very close to off stump, calls for the run, Boucher collects and throws it down the track, and thats shameful from Dravid, taking it easy and not even grounding his bat
good length outside off stump, he pokes at it and gets one down to Nel at third man
good length on the stumps, tucked fine for one
full and slow outside off stump, Yuvraj gets forward and opens the face of the bat to pick up another single out to third man
full and slow again, Yuvraj steers it to backward point, where Gibbs dives and fumbles it away for one
good length outside off stump, he pounces on it, slashing hard through the covers for one
back of a length outside leg stump, tucked fine and Kemp fields, Yuvraj hustles for the second and pushes his partner hard
what are they doing! Yuvraj drives a full delivery and gets an inside-edge to midwicket, doesnt even think about it and sprints, and only a slightly off-the-mark throw from the fielder lets him off
back of a length outside off stump, he gets up and cuts into the covers
overpitched on off stump, he drives to mid-on and gets one more
slower delivery outside off stump, Yuvraj chases it and misses, well bowled
slower one again, this time he gets bat on it, pushing to cover
wow! Slower ball again, he gets down the track and drives hard, but doesnt time it to perfection, and the ball sails just over Kemp's head at long-off
back of a length on leg stump, whipped away for one
banged in short on the stumps, Dhoni doesnt get in control with the pull but plays it into the ground behind square and gets one
fullish ball outside off stump, Yuvraj gets forward and plays it to backward point for a quick single
good ball first up, slow and beating him outside off stump as he stands and fishes
outside leg stump, he shuffles and turns it straight to van Wyk at square leg
good length delivery angled past him, this time he pokes straight to point
and again! Yuvraj's feet dont move as he fishes at a wider delivery
make it five as one more passes the outside edge of Yuvraj's bat! No footwork, just standing and trying to run it down to third man
backs away to leg, hitting a short delivery through the covers for one, though he was pretty darn keen on the non-existent second
full on leg stump, tucked out to deep midwicket for a single
oh ho Dhoni! Gets back and flays one up and over gully, and it bounces past third man for four...valuable runs!
good length just outside off stump, he stands his ground and drives straight to cover, another dot ball for South Africa
shot! Nel serves up a fuller delivery outside off stump that Dhoni, standing his ground again, drives into the gap past a diving Kallis at mid-off...nerves, I say!
this one's full on the stumps, and Dhoni walks down the track to drive hard but fails to beat Kallis this time
short-pitched is the response from Nel, and Dhoni pulls into the ground and gets one to mid-off
dot ball! Hall bowls one on a good length and Dhoni, making room, just hits into the ground and bowler swoops in to field
back of a length on off stump, he stands and works it to midwicket
two more, as Yuvraj makes room and carves this over cover for two, and thats his 50! Well played!
clobbered! Yuvraj takes India closer with a thumping drive back down the ground, which almost took off Dhoni's head!
short on the stumps, he pulls through square leg for two
slower ball, wide of off stump, he makes room and runs it down to third man to level the scores
back of a length on leg stump, tucked straight to square leg
shot and there it is! Series victory for India! Yuvraj stands his ground and swats a back of a length delivery over midwicket and the Indians go berserk!
